citations.narrative:
The outdoor area of a sheltered housing facility containing two adult black-handed spider monkeys is not completely
enclosed by a perimeter fence. The outdoor area of the enclosure has chain link walls and roof, beyond which there is
some additional fencing of various heights. However, there is not one continuous 6 feet tall perimeter fence. A perimeter
fence is essential for preventing contact between exotic animals and unauthorized people or animals. A perimeter fence
also acts as a secondary containment system in the event an animal escapes from its primary enclosure. Correct by May
02, 2023, or by obtaining approval from the Administrator for alternative measures.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.77(f) 
   
Sheltered housing facilities. 
The outdoor area of a sheltered housing facility containing two adult black-handed spider monkeys is not completely 
enclosed by a perimeter fence. The outdoor area of the enclosure has chain link walls and roof, beyond which there is 
some additional fencing of various heights. However, there is not one continuous 6 feet tall perimeter fence. A perimeter 
fence is essential for preventing contact between exotic animals and unauthorized people or animals. A perimeter fence 
also acts as a secondary containment system in the event an animal escapes from its primary enclosure. Correct by May 
02, 2023, or by obtaining approval from the Administrator for alternative measures. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
